title: Unified Inbox
content:
I'm migrating from Microsoft Outlook, but am having some issues with the unified inbox, which is why I wanted to move from Outlook to begin with.

My inbox message counts don't make sense to me... Inbox 233 Account 1 3032 Account 2 1770 Account 3 0

My inbox actually only has like 15 emails in it total, but has a bunch of emails dated 12/31/1969 at 6 PM with no info that I can't delete or archive. How do I get rid of these?!
creator: taylor19

title: I get this question dozens of times every day....: "Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account"  Why would I give Google permissions to access delete or do anything else  to my email and contacts:
content:
WHY AM I GETTING THIS REQUEST... DOZENS OF TIMES A DAY?

Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account undefined my gmail.com account: This will allow Mozilla Thunderbird Email to:

More info: Read, compose, send, and permanently delete all your email from Gmail Click for more information

More info: See, edit, download, and permanently delete your contacts Click for more information

More info: See, edit, share, and permanently delete all the calendars you can access using Google Calendar Click for more information

By clicking Allow, you allow this app and Google to use your information in accordance with their respective privacy policies. You can change this and other Account Permissions at any time.

HOW CAN I DISALLOW Google to do anything with my account and contacts?
creator: paulholtzheimer

creator: jocieb

title: Thunderbird non sincronizza più la posta con il server di Aruba
content: Buongiorno, uso Thunderbird senza problemi da diversi anni per gestire le mi mail da alcuni server IMAP tra cui Aruba. Da una settimana circa ho dei problemi con il server di Aruba e solo con quello. E' tutto iniziato in un modo strano, quando scaricavo la posta la casella posta in arrivo del server di Aruba mi indicava un numero di mail ancora da leggere superiore a quelle che venivano realmente scaricate. Nei giorni seguenti il divario è aumentato ed in effetti andando sulla webmail di Aruba trovavo mail che non erano state scaricate. Da un paio di giorni da quel server non scarica più niente. Colpa di Thunderbird o di Aruba? Da dove posso incominciare a mettere le mani? Grazie a chi mi vorrà aiutare.
creator: silvano.vergoli

title: Thunderbird email problems
content: Within my means, i am a keen su[[porter of Thunderbird, but I must confess I am really getting fed up with it. Recently I have been having A spate of problems. I recently had a problem where all my inbox mail ended up in my trash folder and you provided help to solve this issue, thank you. No sooner had that been fixed when I then booted Thunderbird up and, although all folder in the left hand page were there, all present and correct, there were were no emails listed on the right hand side except the Thunderbird home page. Do I just give up on Thunderbird for fear of what next problem looms up unexpectedly?

title: Problemas para abrir .EML Remotos
content:
Hola, desde hace 3 dias estoy teniendo problema que algunos equipos dejaron de poder abrir .EML Compartidos/Remotos del Servidor.

-Hace tiempo trabajamos con una carpeta compartida, donde se guardan .EML y luego se abren individualmente en diferentes puestos desde el Thunderbird. Pero ahora en 3 puestos cuando abren esos .EML quedan en blanco.

  • Se revisaron todo los permisos /credenciales de compartir y no viene por ese lado el problema. Sino algo de Thunderbild que cambio.

Ya que en otros puesto sigue funcionando todo con normalidad.

Probé reinstalando el Thunderbird / Probando desde otro Usuario de Windows y el problema continua. Aguardo sus consejos.

Muchas Gracias
creator: rodrigo.matias.a

title: Lentezza nell'avvio di Thunderbird
content: Salve a tutti, da molto tempo riscontro una lentezza nell'avvio di Thunderbird che non riscontravo prima. Ho seguito le istruzioni per risolvere il problema ma senza risultati. Ho installato recentemente una versione aggiornata ma niente da fare. Il mio Mac non è proprio di ultima generazione (27 di fine 2015) ma con la vecchia versione fino ad un anno fà andava tutto bene. Non ho fatto aggiornamenti al sistema negli ultimi tempi, ho un Monterey 12.7.4. Se qualcuno può aiutarmi con qualche consiglio lo ringrazio anticipatamente. Un saluto a tutti

title: "Side-by-side configuration is incorrect" prevents program even loading
content:
The attached image shows the error message I get when I try to run Thunderbird. This has been the case for several months, and all of the suggestions I've found online have failed to make any difference at all.

It seems this must be a fairly common error with other software, but within Mozilla's help menus I could find only one thread of two messages that addressed it at all, with no solution offered.

I'm running Windows 11, and have had no problems with Thunderbird until this one.

I hope someone can offer a solution that works for me.

Thanks,

Neil Farrell
creator: tenpiualto

title: Problem with account folder compression
content:
I am running on the latest Windows 11, Thunderbird 138.0.1 and I am on the release update channel. I am using a google email and the inbox only has 430 messages. I notice one day this message popped up:

The folder 'Inbox/USPS on jeterry3@gmail.com' could not be compacted because writing to folder failed. Verify that you have enough disk space, and that you have write privileges to the file system, then try again.

I have 630 gb free on this drive. There were only 2 emails in that folder I do not know what or where to look as this just started up. I have done a "Repair Folder" Thoughts where to go next? Thanks!

title: Install Thunderbird on new laptop
content:
I am attempting to install Thunderbird on a new laptop and move personal folders from old to new PC. The installation process finds my email address and ISP information but fails with incorrect password.

Steps - 1. enter user name 2. enter email address 3. install finds correct ISP information 4. accept ISP information without changes 5. enter email password 6. process popup say incorrect user name, ISP info or password 7. login to ATT.NET successfully which indicates to me that the userid and password are correct for email account.

what other information could I supply to assist with problem resolution? I do not know what to do next.

Thank you, Neal
